item.title: A Data Structures and Algorithms Self-Study Curriculum
item.description:
Background Story Link to heading

Imagine you’re mentoring an engineer who’s eager to brush up on their coding skills after a hiatus from programming. This was precisely the scenario I found myself in recently. A mentee of mine had been away from coding for quite some time and was keen to get back into the swing of things, particularly focusing on data structures and algorithms.
